channel.title: Youtube on Rahul's Presence On Internet
channel.description: Recent content in Youtube on Rahul's Presence On Internet

item.title: Code Music with Sonic Pi
item.description: It was just another day, and I found myself surfing YouTube, as one does. That’s when I stumbled upon a video titled “The Art of Code” by Dylan Beattie. Little did I know that this video would become one of the most inspiring pieces of content I’ve ever watched about programming. The video, which is an hour long, held my attention from start to finish. It was a deep dive into the creative and artistic side of coding, something that resonated deeply with me.
